attributes.action: save Fritton Woods from aggregate quarrying
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Fritton Woods is an area of woodland just outside of Great Yarmouth. It is an area that is very important to many local people. It is an area that also has much wildlife.

government_responses.details:
You signed a petition asking the Prime Minister to "save Fritton Woods from aggregate quarrying."

The Prime Minister's Office has responded to that petition and you can view it here: 

http://www.number10.gov.uk/Page21502


Prime Minister's Office
